answers.a: Convolutional codes can be linear or non-linear codes and they have memory.
answers.b: Convolutional codes are linear codes and they have memory.
answers.c: Convolutional codes are linear codes and they may or may not have memory.

answers.a: Viterbi algorithm provides maximum likelihood decoding.
answers.b: Viterbi algorithm can also be applied when the encoder does not start in all-zero state.
answers.c: Viterbi algorithm will fail if there are multiple states with the same state metric.
answers.d: Consider the forward pass of Viterbi algorithm. In any intermediate step, the arriving path to any state with a larger weight is discarded.
